skins.shipDescription: Long Island-class escort carrier C Long Island, Hull Number CVE-1!
skins.selfIntroduction: Hehehe, I am Long Island. Eagle Union's first escort carrier~ Using cute little planes to protect merchant ships, as well as sea lanes... That is my job~
skins.acquisition: Hehe, I'm Long Island~ Hello, Commander. Actually, I have another name. Do you want to know?
skins.login: Roooaar! ... Hehehe, were you shocked? I'm like a ghost that's going to haunt you every day!
skins.details: Can't see me... can't see me... can't see me...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Russian roulette~ candy time~ Pick the one~ with wasabi inside~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Let's drink together, eh? Cheeers~ Bfft! So bitter... I ended up drinking what the Commander is supposed to drink!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander~ Do my sleeves~ look like those of a ghost~?
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, you dummy~! There's glue here~! ...Wh-What?! I'm stuck?! What do I do?!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Wh- what you touched isn't me! What you touched... is...a... a ghost!

skins.shipDescription: Commander~ I am Long Island~ I've changed? Ghosts don't cha... Huh? I seemed to have become a little more alive!
skins.acquisition: Commander~ I am Long Island~ I've changed? Ghosts don't cha... Huh? I seemed to have become a little more alive!
skins.details: Hmm? This outfit is more refreshing so, no issues!
skins.secretaryIdle1: You know, Long Island the ghost has become boring... Now, I am Long Island the Jiangshi, jumping zombie!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Ehehe~ Commander, are you looking for your gaming handheld?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Com~man~der~! Huh? You really fell asleep? Hehehe~ What kind of pranks should I pull?
skins.secretaryTouch: Lunch together? I need to finish assembling my plastic model, so, apologies, Commander!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I am a ghost~! ...Still, it's not good to touch ghosts out of a whim!

skins.shipDescription: Everyone's favorite and talked-about Long Island, actually has another hidden secret...
skins.acquisition: Everyone's favorite and talked-about Long Island, actually has another hidden secret...
skins.details: That get up is the usual Long Island wearing her public face~ ... Want some potato chips?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, don’t bother me, I’m really busy right now. Busy with what? Games! All of these stuipid friggin backlogged games!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, I brought a bunch of snacks~ Should I give you some?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, do you like High Grade or Magical Grade stuff? I even got Powerful Grade stuff too!

skins.JPClientName: 幽さんのハロウィン生放送
skins.shipDescription: "Tune in everyone, Gamer Girl L.I. is about to begin her spooky Halloween special stream~" ...Well, that should do it for my channel intro... Hmm, wonder how many viewers I'll get~
